name: Chaos Theory: The Curse of Butterfly Island
name_original: Chaos Theory: The Curse of Butterfly Island
description:
-Chaos Theory- The Curse of Butterfly Island

"It has been said something as small as the flutter of a butterfly's wing can ultimately cause a Hurricane halfway around the world" 

 - Chaos Theory

In a world where one man living alone on an island has the ability to change the weather all across the world with butterflys?  You play as Billy the Butterfly breeder, using your specially bred butterflys, you harness the power of chaos and rid the world of the destructive HURRICANES. Protect your house from being destroyed by collecting resources scattered around the island to build walls. Use the TV to find out which side the Hurricane is coming from. Cross breed different butterflys and release them to change the affects of the next Hurricane (Hey maybe it'll bring you more resources). Release the rainbow butterfly to end all Hurricanes and finish this epic tale.

Made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Works best in full screen mode.
